oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: Bushman terms for various degrees of relationship. Given by /han≠kass’o (L VIII.
8847). Terms for various relationships by marriage. (L VIII.
12. 7067 rev. and 7068 rev., 32. 8794 rev.). Some of these terms seem to be spoken by men or women and apply to relations of different genders and ages.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relationships
